entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
